explainability.path_to_improvement: Document how explanations are provided to users affected by AI decisions.

external_accountability.path_to_improvement: Obtain external validation of AI practices or require vendor certifications.

fairness.path_to_improvement: Document bias testing procedures or vendor AI fairness requirements.

governance.findings: The company's technology organization references an AI Delivery Team and an Accounting Automation and AI Team. These teams are responsible for designing, developing, and deploying AI solutions.
governance.path_to_improvement: Name an AI governance body with defined mandate covering all AI use.

relevant_sources.summary: This Publix corporate page, describing their technology organization, provides evidence for the **governance** pillar. The document's mention of an AI Delivery Team and an Accounting Automation and AI Team, responsible for designing, developing, and deploying AI solutions, implies a structured approach to AI development and oversight, which is a key aspect of governance.
relevant_sources.title: Publix Technology Careers - Information Technology

oversight.path_to_improvement: Document human review processes for AI-assisted decisions (built or vendor AI).

privacy.path_to_improvement: Document data protection practices for AI systems, including vendor AI data handling.

transparency.path_to_improvement: Document AI systems in use, including vendor/third-party AI tools.

summary.overall_findings: Publix Super Markets' published materials indicate that its technology organization references an AI Delivery Team and an Accounting Automation and AI Team, addressing the governance pillar. This constitutes documented evidence for 1 of 7 evaluated responsible AI pillars. No qualifying public evidence was found for the majority of the 7 evaluated pillars, based on a review of 1 publicly available source.
